description: Creative Enzymes is a major player in the global market of enzyme services. We are specialized in activity measurement and kinetic assay, especially using light scattering assays. As a well-known service provider, Creative Enzymes is recognized as a leader in the development of unique and unrivaled bioanalytical services for various enzymes serving the needs of the pharmaceutical, biotechnological, and diagnostic industry. Through most up-to-date facilities and industry-leading technologies, we provide innovative bespoke enzyme services to customers.
name: Light Scattering Enzyme Assays
